Title: Provides a vehicle registration refund for persons seventy-five years of age or older who surrender their registration
Summary: Provides a vehicle registration refund for persons seventy-five years of age or older who surrender their registration.
LawCode: Amd ยง428, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing a vehicle registration refund for persons seventy-five years of age or older who surrender their registration
